== '''GLAMEPS Laboratory System: Technical Aspects''' ==
[[LastModified]]
[[Center(end)]]

This page contains technical information about the laboratory system for GLAMEPS which is currently in its initial developing phase.

Please note that GLAMEPS laboratory systerm is only at its initial development phase, the information presented on this page is subjected to updates by all staffs involved in this work.

== GLAMEPS laboratory system ==
 * purpose, scope
 * contributing staff
== Main features of GLAMEPS laboratory system ==
  * HIRLAM EPS ensemble generation system
    * mini-SMS script to control simultaneous ensemble forecasts
    * purturbation of HIRLAM analysis using TEPS ensemble
    * modification of MARS data retrival scripts for getting data on rotated coordinate and frames
    * modification of post-processing streams for EPS purpose
    * modification of archiving strategy for EPS purpose
  * ALADIN EPS ensemble generation system
  * GLAMEPS post-processing and verification system
